Description.Text: The hotel enjoys a strategic location at the heart of the city of Klang. It is situated within walking distance of some of Klang's largest shopping complexes, night markets, entertainment centres, fast-food outlets and restaurants. The hotel is also located just 5 minutes' walk from the bus and taxi stations and 10 minutes from the railway station. The Port Klang and Shah Alam can be reached within 15 minutes' drive, Kuala Lumpur within a 30 minutes' drive and Kuala Lumpur International Airport within 40 minutes' drive of the hotel.

This 7-storey hotel offers guests a wide range of facilities and services assuring them a comfortable stay. These include a good security system, CCTV cameras, keycard access, a fire sprinkler system and 24-hour room service. Guests are welcomed in the air-conditioned hotel's lobby, which offers a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service, as well as a hotel safe, newspaper stand and lift access to the upper floors. Further amenities include high-speed wireless broadband Internet access (for an additional fee) and conference facilities. Those arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the hotel car park.
